summary: This mod adds Lagertha (inspired in Vikings TV series) to your game!
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://i1140.photobucket.com/albums/n570/MokutonYamato/Description_zps03a85ef4.png[/img]

This is Lagertha, a beautiful blonde nord. Based on the Vikings TV series, she's waiting to join you in your adventures

[img]http://i1140.photobucket.com/albums/n570/MokutonYamato/location_zps7584d26e.png[/img]

You'll be able to find her and recruit her in the Windpeak Inn, at Dawnstar.

[img]http://i1140.photobucket.com/albums/n570/MokutonYamato/installing_zpsc75ab48a.png[/img]

-> Fully supports Nexus Mod Manager installation
-> Manual installing
L> Open up zip file with WinRar or any other file opener
-> Extract Data folder in your Skyrim Directory
(Often: Program Files (x86) / Steam / SteamApps / Common / Skyrim )

[img]http://i1140.photobucket.com/albums/n570/MokutonYamato/credits_zps12e8caea.png[/img]

-> Nexus Community
-> You for Downloading <3

[img]http://i1140.photobucket.com/albums/n570/MokutonYamato/mofopsn_zps8209f08b.png[/img]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/55340][img]http://i1140.photobucket.com/albums/n570/MokutonYamato/Ragnar-Follower_zps9bdffab9.jpg[/img][/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/55493][img]http://i1140.photobucket.com/albums/n570/MokutonYamato/Ygritte-Follower_zpsf23054f4.jpg[/img][/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/55280][img]http://i1140.photobucket.com/albums/n570/MokutonYamato/Ginez-Follower_zpse9851a31.jpg[/img][/url]
